website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent, affordable entry-level camera that is compatible with the whole family of Nikon accessories (including a Wi-Fi adapter).
pros: Point-and-shoot automatic features produce great results in most situations
Customers are happy with its very sharp photos with great color, as well as superb low light capabilities
cons: Advanced controls are clumsy to navigate
Video capabilities are limited and some users complain about poor sound quality

website_summaries.verdict: Very good photo quality for its class plus decent performance make the Nikon D3300 A solid choice for a first dSLR.
pros: The Nikon D3300's photo quality improves on its predecessor, and while it's not incredibly fast it performs pretty well for its price class
cons: The feature set remains pretty limited

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful camera, simple but can be highly advanced
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. Its been on numerous trips with me, such as North Carolina, Washington DC, the Adirondacks, Cape Cod, Baltimore, and so many more. The quality is SUPER nice, and the audio from videos is VERY crisp. This was my first DSLR, and I would recommend this to anybody whos looking for a nice simple DSLR with auto and manual settings. Ive had this caera for almost a year now as well and its highly durable! Its been in boats, cars, tree tops, boxes, waterproof bags, you name it. I love my little D3300 and I hope you will too!! 100 outta 5 stars! (if you like my photos follow me on instagram @emmie.phorourke)
customer_reviews.author: amyra

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my favorite Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Amazon purchases. The camera is great for its class and price. It's a perfect fit for beginners and amateurs who want to get the hang of basic photography without spending an arm and a leg. The camera is easy to handle. When buying a DSLR, though: keep in mind the price of camera bodies but also keep in mind the price of lenses that fit that body. I'm finding that lenses for similar Canon bodies are cheaper now that I want to buy more accessories and lenses. So the relatively low price of this model may produce costs later. Do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Horia Dijmarescu

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I bought mine certified refurbished and it looks and works like it was brand new. If you are looking to get this item you should not hesitate. My camera shipped to me within a couple of days which is always great. It comes with 1 Nikon battery, Nikon neck strap (cheap strap I recommend you get a better one), the camera body of course, 1 battery charger, USB cable for your computer, a cable for your TV, and the 18-55 kit lens. There is no memory card with it if you were wondering so get your own SD card seperatly.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ludegna

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything I want in a DSLR. Image quality is excellent, controls are easy and intuitive, and dedicated hobbyists have a lot of power, flexibility, and control available to make the most of their photo-ops. The autofocus is fast and convenient. Best of all, the camera is a joy to hold, with a comfortable, ergonomic design. While the 18-55 kit lens is perfectly fine for most uses, I would recommend a fixed-length lens in addition, due to its superior optical properties. I roll with Nikon's 35mm AF-S lens myself, which is great for both close-up portraits as well as grand landscape shots. Overall, 5/5, would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vivek

customer_reviews.title: My D3300
customer_reviews.text: Have not had this long enough to write a comprehensive review. I love what I have seen so far, and am confident that this "entry level" D3300, is an absolute jewel for the modest asking price. 24 megapixels, for me, is ridiculous. I shoot at 13. All pics are very clean. Video is stunning. I didn't expect that to be that good. After all, it's not a video camera. I'm not particularly thrilled over pushing a button to release the lens but, that kit lens does a real good job.
customer_reviews.author: James Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of good reviews already, so I'm not going to reproduce their work. My main point: I wish I would have upgraded from a point and shoot a long time ago. I'm having fun taking pictures of all kinds of stuff besides friends and family. I think the camera is very reliable and offers a good balance between complexity and ease of use. Wish I had sprung for the camera bundle with the additional lens. I ended up buying a used telephoto lens and that's been really fun, but it's 10 year old technology (but has more zoom power!) This was my first DSLR purchase, but I've had about 5 pretty nice point and shoot cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Leynes

customer_reviews.title: I've used the SLR camera's for years and paid for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the SLR camera's for years and paid for a lot of unclear photos!! I took several photo's of my 2 adult sons racing their 450 Mod. Honda's a few weeks ago @ the Grand Nationals Motor cycle Ice Races!! Even though the sun wasn't always out the colors were very vivid and sharp!!!! I wish I would of purchased one several years ago.!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: My camera arrived today. It is in perfect condition and takes great pictures. Everything listed in the used camera selling is here and I think the seller actually highlighted some small blemishes more than needed in the listing. I'm very happy with this. I've wanted to buy a beginner DSLR for quite some time and this is perfect with a good price thanks to being refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: Wondeful Camera for the first time DSLR user!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first DSLR so I did a fair amount of research before purchase. VERY happy with it!!! I just returned from a trip to Costa Rica. I spent 10 days with this camera literally in my hands most of the time and it was perfect. Compact enough not to be a burden but easy to use. I did purchase another zoom lens which I would recommend if you are looking to take close up pics of things like far away animals as I was on a trip like ours.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Palisin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Canon AE 1 in the old days of film-- I thought it was the perfect combination of great photos and easy to use. This camera is so much better! The quality of the photos is amazing, the battery life exceptional, and it's very easy to use-- one 30 minute you tube video and you're ready to do all kinds of tricks. I took it to England right after getting it, shot 400 pictures in 9 days and didn't even recharge the battery. Excellent indoor shots without a flash. Perfect for small hands, lightweight, couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: RunsInCircles

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, as well as great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice photographer at best. This camera is lightweight without feeling cheap. The pictures I have been taking are beautiful and the auto setting is mindless, just point and shoot, couldn't be easier! I am really looking forward to taking more pictures as I learn more about the different settings as well as how and when to use them. I love that I can use the wireless adapter (optional) and view my pictures on my tablet and phone. Also bought the wireless remote control to take group pictures which is amazingly easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Highdhoe

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera
customer_reviews.text: Late review but have been using camera for about 4 months now i am an amateur but really loving this camera i watch allot of online help videos and do allot of reading . I use it for mostly pictures but recently been doing some videos and i am satisfied with the price and quality im receiving . It took me days to decide on this or the canon but after much consideration i went with Nikon and i would recommend anyone to buy this as your first decent one.
customer_reviews.author: Good CAM

customer_reviews.title: Very capable compact and reasonably-priced DSLR
customer_reviews.text: The D3300 will do anything the serious hobbyist can throw at it. The 18-55mm kit lens is passable, but it's a weak link in the box. To supplement, I purchased the sharp 50mm f1.8D (and I can use this 50mm only in Manual with the D3300, but that's fine) and the 18-140mm. The 18-140mm is sharp, shoots circles around the kit lens, and is a terrific tool for the D3300. Bottom line: Start lens shopping as soon as you start using and getting used to the D3300.
customer_reviews.author: marcusli55

customer_reviews.title: Why are the video files limited to 20 min.
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this camera is that the video files are limited to 20 min; even the most basic cell phone can do longer videos. It does not matter how much room you have on your SD card, you can not take a longer video. The camera takes amazing photographs.
customer_reviews.author: h2_200161813

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D 3300 is my Christmas present to me. I have used a variety of other brands and have no complaint with them. But when I used my husband's Nikon, I understood what quality is. It is difficult to explain, but if you ever driven as well engineered and fast car, you know what I am saying. I love the colors. Recently I posted a photo of a floral display to Facebook and the brightness of the flowers jumps out. Just borrow someone's Nikon. I think you will understand what I mean. I was concerned about the complexity of the controls, this is my first DSLR. Nothing to worry about. The menu explains itself and is easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Geek

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I love this camera, I love this camera! It was affordable, It fit my need perfectly which was high quality pictures and videos, and a microphone jack, thanks Nikon for including it, I almost would've gone with the Canon T6, but, no mic jack, so I went with the D3300, and I'm glad I did. This camera is amazing, I still haven't perfected my skill in using it but, that's my fault, not the camera's. It's small and light but, not too small or too light. It's right in the area of perfection. I love this camera so much, I plan on doing big things with it
customer_reviews.author: Mason b.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer in NC and this was my very first camera. I am just writing this review January 2019 but I purchased this camera in April of 2017! SUPER satisfied. I am currently looking to upgrade to a NikonD750 but I am definitely going to still use this one for a backup. Great for a beginner! Follow my photography page on Instagram -- @yourstoryimages.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade to a 10 year old, 4MP Nikon. It uses the same lenses as what I already had, so I didn't have to spend extra money. I love that Nikon has the defined lense lines and you can easily upgrade. I held back for so long thinking I'd have to buy all new lenses and what not. The pictures are absolutely gorgeous, and the finishing I can do on my PC with this resolution is just amazing. Its a great camera, reliable, and as my previous model still works, I would even say that these cameras are long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Derokorian

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 5 years. Very glad it has an Auto settings feature because there is a very high learning curve. Took some video of a band, in a dark room once, was very grainy. Probably messed up one of the settings..Acward But im glad I have it. I made lots of crisp ones in better lighting (Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 35mm)
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for price... Needs additional lens 55-300mm recommended...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera... Much better than my prior Canon!! Pictures are clear and video is excellent. Controls are a bit clumsy... especially when changing from still shots to video. Also HIGHLY recommend purchasing a more powerful zoom lens...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kron

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the money 😍
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the D3300 about 2 weeks ago and end uo recieving the D3000 from an untrusted seller, ANYWAYS the D3000 was fabulous but i finally got in my D3300 and i couldnt be happier! It has so many features and the Auto is PERFECT for beginners, highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find it easy to us and the results are astounding
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon D3300 camera I ordered has exceeded my expectations a lot. I find it easy to us and the results are astounding! I have had several good Nikon cameras over the years but this one is the best ever. I could hardly believe when I ordered it that is would be a good as advertised for the amount of money it cost. I did find a detailed review of this camera that gave me the confidence to proceed with the order. I am glad I did! Jim the giant
customer_reviews.author: Jim the giant

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: First foray into DSLR territory, VERY impressed with this camera. So far the Auto mode has been good enough for me; the pictures are almost perfect every time, but I'll get into fiddling soon. This camera blows all those point and shoots I've ever tried out of the water (expectedly so I suppose). But it can be used as a point and shoot, the time from switching it on to taking pictures is shorter than any other camera I've ever used. (Not a big camera person btw).
customer_reviews.author: geeharree

customer_reviews.title: Nikon camera
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as "very good condition" which I would disagree with. The camera was dirty, the standard lens has a large scratch on it as does the back review screen. The lens has dust in it and grinds when focusing.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Small, dim viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I returned this camera and ordered the 5300 instead. While it is lightweight and easy to hold, I found the viewfinder on the dim side and the LCD screen too small for my less than perfect vision. Picture quality was excellent. But I wanted a camera a bit more user friendly... and the 5300 is much better on that score.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality and ease of use for first time SLR users
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Nikon point and shoot cameras. S8100 and I go waaay back. When that one started dropping pixels after years of use, I decided to upgrade. This is my first SLR camera and I love it. The image quality is superior even to the S8100 and it's very easy to use as a point and shoot for a noob like me. I'm just starting to dive into the nitty gritty settings and I'm having fun on the journey.
customer_reviews.author: Trillium

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great camera for photography enthusiasts
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great camera for photography enthusiasts. A good camera for novice photographers to practice and learn with. I don't consider it a professional level camera, but it does take great quality photos. I highly recommend buying a better Zoom Lens though. Definitely worth the money if you put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great DSLR!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic entry level DSLR. I am shooting SLR again for the first time in 14 years. My last SLR was a Nikon N70 film camera. Great features. Fantastic photos. You really can't compare DSLR to point and shoots. Quick shutter. Great control over all photo parameters. Built-in flash will make do but probably need to get an external if you are going to shoot mainly indoors. You might be able to pick up a refurbished 3200 for a great price. Not much of a downgrade for a $100 or so less
customer_reviews.author: PinkTwig

customer_reviews.title: Researched quite awhile and chose this
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SLR and it is very easy to use. My primary reason for choosing Nikon over the Cannon Rebel was the weight was much less and the menu is very user friendly. I don't need to carry a manual around, it is right there when I forget what setting I want. Can just point and shoot as a beginner and get great pics.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D3300
customer_reviews.text: Just received it after waiting for a long time. I've watched several videos on the camera and the capability is awesome. Bought because of the name and the awesome ratings. They were really responsive from their web site when I registered it. Really happy -it will do everything I would like it to.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I've used it for kids sports, birding, vacation trips, etc., and I look like a pro! I got it with the Nikon 55-300mm Nikkor zoom lense and the 18-55 that comes with it. There are certainly better lenses out there, but for the average Joe, you'll be really pleased with your pics. The multi-snap setting when this is in sports mode works great. I've taken great pics of my son and his teammates pitching and hitting. It's a great tool to show them what's going on at different points in their wind-up or their swing. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Nikon D3300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that caught my attention with the D3300 out of the box was how light and comfortable it feels in my hands. The camera grip is very smooth and big enough to allow for a secure grip. I also like how the lens retract and take up less space in the camera bag. This camera has the best combination of image quality, features, handling, size/weight, and price on the market right now, I highly recommend the Nikon D3300
customer_reviews.author: RBarran

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at it's Finest. This is the camera to buy if you want to save $$ on the body and invest in glass! Such great focus. Beautiful images and fairly easy to use. For an entry level...this is a classic great camera. ~ Thanks
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and I am just beginning to learn the capabilities. Great entry level with a lot of performance with less of the bells and whistles the others charge hundreds for. Get a good prime lens or get familiar with the one it comes with and you are good to go. The prime lens will give more light and a more refined picture.
customer_reviews.author: JJV

customer_reviews.title: Not for the novice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit more complicated than I would have liked. Some features have options to turn them off in multiple places and others have it in only one, hard to access menu. The button to snap pics is also not in a place where your hand naturally would rest so you miss a lot of shots as you adjust your grip. Taking pics of young children is also difficult because unless you are in midday light you cannot turn off the flash without the red eye reduction light coming on and the child flinching.
customer_reviews.author: Hollanda77

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but cannot operate under sunlight in a park for 1h  due to overheating
customer_reviews.text: While the quality of pictures and videos is all I expected ... Simply beautiful ! When it came to the day that I needed to record a show in a park, the camera did not stand being on a tripod exposed to the sun ( less than 1h) a warning message of the device being overheated showed and the videos could not be recorded more than 1 minute... So disappointing 😞
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I went with this refurbished one
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical buying a refurbished camera and went back and forth forever on whether it was just worth it to get the brand new one. But man, I'm so glad I went with this refurbished one! The seller has a great reputation and is a certified Nikon dealer (which is also important). Received camera promptly, everything was there, it takes amazing pictures and I'm so glad I went with it! Was also debating Nikon or canon but very thankful I decided Nikon!
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Has a great feel. Light in weight and even though its ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a great feel. Light in weight and even though its digital I love hearing the "click" when it takes the picture. The only feature that you have to get used to is looking through the lens when shooting. You can't look at the screen while taking the picture. It only shows up on the screen after you've taken the shot.
customer_reviews.author: mathew j.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. I'm still learning how to work this camera and all its gadgets. If you were getting your first SLR camera I would suggest this one. It's great for beginners but still has a lot of the bells and whistles that a more expensive camera has.
customer_reviews.author: Epotter10

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "real" camera and it is so awesome. I've taken it out on a week long road trip only but the 500 pictures I took came out great! I've ordered a book to learn a little more. But I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: cristina sola

customer_reviews.title: A great camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera. It is billed as an advanced amateur camera as opposed to a professional one. I am not sure I agree with that characterization. It is an order of magnitude better than any camera money could buy a few years ago. Perhaps some professionals would demand more, but I am overwhelmed with all the features and especially with the quality of the photographs this camera produces.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mulwitz

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Probably one of the best investments we ever made. We where spend 200 - 500 a year on pictures. Now my wife take what she wants and has them developed. Takes great pictures and has paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: JGonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade; should make a fine starter camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far; haven't tried the panoramic function but will soon. I'm not interested in the "wireless" part of it, but love the higher resolution (double of my old D3100), higher multiple shot speed (5 per sec vs. 3 per sec.) and overall function and display info.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: great for hobbyists and beginners
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take family pictures and pictures of my friends, maybe a photoshoot here or there, and I love it so much. great pictures, easy to use, small enough for my small hands. all around great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Do it! Press the proceed to checkout button! You wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: For this price range, and just cameras in general, this camera is a flawless buy. It has everything I wanted, and more. My creative pursuits will be fueled with this camera, and doors opened. I could easily make a very high detail, crisp and smooth movie with this, or do high end photo shoots. This camera rules, def is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Anderson

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a birthday gift for my mom. She absolutely Loved it!! It's a great DSLR camera for entry to advanced level people. There is a beginner mode and a advanced mode to help with the learning curve. The one gripe I had with it is, the plain package option doesn't come with a memory card. Also don't forget to click on the free accessories option. I couldn't because it was out of stock at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Austynn Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Use to have a 35mm camera years ago, decided to renew a hobby with a dslr and this is a great camera to start out with. Many features that I love, already spending more on different lenses. Use it mostly for sports and outdoors and have been taking some great pictures. Going from a point and shoot to this camera the pictures are 100% better and I can become more creative.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera from Nikon that takes exceptional photos
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera from Nikon that takes exceptional photos! Easy to use and set up. The lens provided is perfect and retracts to a nice compact size for convenient travel. After experiencing lens failures on 2 Nikon Coolpix cameras, we decided that the technology on the coolpix was flawed. We moved up to the D3300 and are so happy we will never look back!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Czapski

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and great image quality
customer_reviews.text: this camera not only looks nice but performs well. it is easy to use and has some cool functions on it, although some things could be adjusted quicker i do more landscape photography and am in no hurry for adjusting. i have seen reviews saying that you can hear the lense adjusting during video but i havnt experienced this problem. the downside for me is that it doest zoom much for long distance shots
customer_reviews.author: joshua burns

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As an inexperienced user, I am very excited with this purchase. This camera was recommended as a very good start into photography. The camera was on my doorstep 2 days after clicking "Buy Now" and as promised. FYI, ad the memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy_43302

customer_reviews.title: awesome first DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. As a beginning photographer, this is the perfect camera to learn stuff like f stop, aprature mode, composition, etc. And the price is right, who wants to drop a couple grand on a camera if you don't know if you will use it or even how to use it? If you are just starting out, this is a great camera for you. And pick up Tony Northrup's book "stunning digital photography".
customer_reviews.author: Fijibound

customer_reviews.title: I can not believe how much better pictures look when taken with this versus my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: New to photography and I have to say I'm loving this camera. If you're looking for an entry level camera that won't break the bank, this is it. I can not believe how much better pictures look when taken with this versus my iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Lane

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: Love my camera! Can't wait to get more lenses. The first I bought and had to exchange because there was a small scratch on the lense, but Amazon got me a new one within 2 days! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: maggie liss

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Still learning to use dSLR, but it is an enjoyable experience here. I've added a few shots I've taken with this camera. The results made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great but lens was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Overall product is great. Only have one complaint and it was the 18-55mm lens was defective. When adding a polarizer filter lens to preserve the lens as a whole, I saw 2-3 "bubbles" on it that cannot be removed. I wish it could have been noticed before shipping the product.
customer_reviews.author: GIAchick11

customer_reviews.title: An updated excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this model as I hae used and loved the D3200 and the D3300 has a few changes that sounded interesting. The 3300 is slightly smaller with a new smaller lens and has some new effects that earlier models don't have. I got a refurbished one at a very good price. These should be just as good as new for a good price so save some money if you can.
customer_reviews.author: KSArnold

customer_reviews.title: Best entry level DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level DSLR. Couldn’t reccommend it enough. Not so great for video auto focus (like really bad), my only complaint at all. Otherwise great camera that has all the features and functions of Nikons other more expensive DSLRs all for a budget friendly cost of entry. Has features the d3400 doesn’t (self cleaning sensor, mic input jack), but doesn’t have the Bluetooth the d3409 has (but doesn’t work on the 3400 and when it does isn’t worth it anyways). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua jj

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love and am very happy with this purchase! I’m a beginner and this is just what I was looking for to start my photography journey!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: very light and small
customer_reviews.text: amazing, and wayy lighter than the 3200. my dad has the 3200 and my 33 is much more preferable. light, small, good features. everything is better. 1080p 60fps = better than canon's lowsy 30fps... have now owned for about a year, still learning new features on this thing. I love it still!!
customer_reviews.author: dean westen

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Loving this camera very much. Good companion for all my vacations. Easy to use and i have learnt a lot from this camera. Good exposure. Picture quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Balamurugan MRB

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing photos. Great starter camera. Easy to use. Photos are crystal clear on demanding 5k display.. Wifi to smartphone feature (if you buy adapter) works great but shrinks photos so it's strictly for social media or a quick email.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. If you plan on using it for photography, then I would fully recommend it to anyone starting out or on a budget. This was my first DSLR camera, and it hasn't disappointed me. If you plan on using it for video, you should know you can't change the aperture while recording. Also, the camera doesn't support RAW video. So, don't plan on being able to fix exposure or color correct the same way you can RAW images in post.
customer_reviews.author: Jake B.

customer_reviews.title: purely emotional review
customer_reviews.text: Not really qualified to review dslr camera. First ever of this kind, and it's a present for my kid. She is very happy with this. 5 star is based on any knowledge, just my kid likes this. Price is right for beginner photographer with ambitions.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family pictures, travel etc
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting out so still learning everything but so far, this was a fantastic purchase. I got a great deal plus had an Amazon gift card so that helped out but this camera is great for beginners. Easy to use and takes amazing pictures. I can't wait to take it to Disney!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: I have taken excellent pictures. The definition is extraordinary and it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I have taken excellent pictures. The definition is extraordinary and it doesn't permit pixelated pictures. It have too many options and the gain is incredible. When you are thinking to get dark pictures, it is amazing what you get.
customer_reviews.author: ooma lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Just wish it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it. She carries it with her to just about everywhere but Walmart. Got the most lovely pictures for her photography class when we went on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Nikon D3000. It's worlds better! It's by no means on par with more expensive cameras, but for the price, you really can't go wrong. I find the stock lens to be a little gimmicky. but I can see the appeal to those that need something they can store in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Jared B.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful camera, clear,vibrant photos even a beginner can use it and feel like you're in a photo studio. I'm so in love with my camera. I've bought Nikon before but this is excellent good purchase for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy A. Bizzario

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this camera, which performed beautifully on a recent trip to Patagonia and Santiago. It's lightweight but took some knocks with no problem. Quite easy to navigate, and I love all the features. I like the D3300 so much that I bought my latest camera to replace the same model I lost last year. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: A good camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the pictures it takes, but it tends to freeze and operate poorly in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel d'oran

customer_reviews.title: Been 3 months and it still works great. Just need to learn to work some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Been 3 months and it still works great. Just need to learn to work some of the features. Hopefully you guys are taking amazing pictures like me 😁
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camera for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: An awesome camera for a beginner. I didn't really know what to expect or look for because I don't know too much about cameras, but this was exactly what I was hoping for. Not sure if it's the best camera for a professional, but if you're looking for a nice DSLR without having to break the bank, this is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and comes with the charging station as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and comes with the charging station as well as a wrist strap and battery. I was expecting just the shell. Really happy with the product and my guy is gonna love it for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Milar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refurbished and it is perfect for me. I wanted an affordable DSLR that would give me clean photos with enough features to build some basic photography skills. Loving exploring and documenting my adventures with high quality photos. Haven't noticed any issues and I can't wait to get some more accessories.
customer_reviews.author: AE Boyer

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been great. I've learned to use Manual mode in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to take to the honeymoon in October. So far it's been great. I've learned to use Manual mode in a matter of weeks. I've taken a couple of portrait pictures of friends and family and they've come out great. I'm hoping to capture great pictures whilst in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar F. M.

customer_reviews.title: Take it from amatuer - Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this camera and I'm really obsessing over it. I'm not professional in any way but I love good quality pictures and just getting a camera high MP wasn't enough. I'm learning something new about it everyday but the quality of the pictures is amazing and it's so easy to use. I'm proud of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BriiShopsHere

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for a Christmas gift. The recipient loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Solid Camera for Beginners - Outstanding Picture Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bad boy 2 days ago and received it it tip top shape. The picture quality is outstanding. Especially at ISO 400 with 34mm exposure. The "auto" setting is perfect for beginners. After you perfect your craft you an then move on to the manual setting when taking pictures. I strongly stand behind this product! No need for the 55 to 200 lens unless you plan on taking really wide range shots. If you are looking to take pictures of products, headshots, fashion and other regular type photoshoots, then 18-55mm is all you need. Just make sure you have really good lighting to ensure optimal performance. Great Camera!
customer_reviews.author: Retro978

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I'm no photographer, but I'd imagine this is a great camera for beginner photographers. It also records about 30 minutes of HD video (29 fps, 1920x1080 dpi) which is better than most cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana Sioux

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, highly recommended. I use Auto setting, and it is nice taking pix at night, or in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Phu Tran

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. My first DSLR . Im surprised how wonderfuly this camera works The pictures print flawlessly so far ive printed up to a 8x10 without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent. The camera is flawless. The only the thing bad was that it was missing the usb cable and it was missing the Nikon user manual, fortunately I bought 2 cameras, one from a different seller, and between the two I had all the accessories to get up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly Spencer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: It was above and beyond all my expectations. I am extremely happy with my new Nikon. I Highly recommend Allison's garage sales. The shipment was extremely fast I received it several days before the due date. When I open the box, it was just as good as a brand new camera you get from the store nothing at all wrong with it. In the future I will gladly use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wieserman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product Shipped
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong product. The description indicates Nikon D3300 and I received a Nikon D3400 which is a camera I specifically did not want.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I returned this one because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I returned this one because I found a better bundle price at Costco ( with two lens kit for $499).
customer_reviews.author: QD2018

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera, perfect for all kinds of shots. A lot of settings but quick to get used to a with a little practice takes AWESOME photos
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Very easy to use right out of the box even if you have no digital SLR experience. If you want to just use this as your family camera, place it on auto mode and you will shoot clear and vibrant shots practically every time. Would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level DSLR. Great pics out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on which camera to buy and this one was the best in quality, features and price. It's a great choice as an entry level DSLR taking great pics out of the box. I look forward to learning more about manual features. I definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: an excellent camera. A full 24MP
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, an excellent camera. A full 24MP, other cameras offer less for the price. I got it second hand but works without flaw, not a lot of use marks.
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Great camrea works for my filming and picture projects bought Mic and extra accessories and does the job well great starter camrea
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I'm new to the DSLR game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I'm new to the DSLR game, so I was a little apprehensive at first, but this camera is super simple to use, takes great photos, and I'm getting to where I can start using some of the advanced features. With the manual, onboard guide system, and overall layout, it's very easy to learn how to use everything available on this camera. As far as the technical stuff goes, I relied on several online reviews, ratings etc. and determined that this was the one for me. I'm very happy with it; now I'm starting to save up for another lens.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Messer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner camera
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner camera! Was even able to connect it to my telescope for astrophotography.
customer_reviews.author: Butrovich

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use in his architecture classes in grad school. He has had great success with his photos and will keep it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with ton's of options
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with ton's of options. Read Read Read. I read everything the whole User guide.Go online and read  Research ton's . You take great photo's the camera is just the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Firstwave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, took lots of great pictures of the sights on my Euro trip
customer_reviews.author: Janet Reeves-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A frist-rate Nikon camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a first-rate Nikon camera, small in size (compared to my previous film camera) and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 2 years of purchase. Error was shutter related. Many people seem to face the same error when I googled.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I mated this body with my AF-S DX Nikkor 18-140mm, and use it primarily for action and snap shots. There are plenty of options for the home photographer, and I've used it to take rapid shots of kids and pets around home. The color rendition is excellent with both the 18-140mm and the supplied 18-55mm. Both lenses produce sharp pictures, though pictures taken in low light conditions at high ISO settings (1600 or so) are definitely on the grainy side. I stick to ISO 400 or lower for most uses. I also have a D7100, but find the D3300 much handier for shooting outside of my little Web page studio.
customer_reviews.author: Collin Riley

customer_reviews.title: good as new, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: the camera was as good as new! its an easy camera to figure out and is good for a beginner. if you have the camera on auto it does a great jot of taking pictures in most situations.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Kubik

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished and we love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this refurbished for my husband for Christmas. It is in pristine condition and works very well. My husband loves it!! He is a novice photographer and this is the first dslr he has used.
customer_reviews.author: hjuneh

product_meta.title: Nikon D3300 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR with Auto Focus-S DX Nikkor 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II Zoom Lens (Black)
product_meta.description:
Capture every special moment in the lifelike quality it deserves- and have a great time doing it; With its included zoom lens, the new ultra-compact AF-S DX Nikkor 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II, the D3300 is a small, easy to use HD-SLR. Capture beautiful 24.2-MP photos and 1080p Full HD videos with vibrant colors and softly blurred backgrounds, then share them instantly with your compatible smartphone and the optional WU-1a wireless adapter. Whether you"re creating high-resolution panoramas, adding fun special effects or recording dazzling HD video with sound, the D3300 will bring you endless joy, excitement and memories-just like the special moments of your life.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Capture every special moment in the lifelike quality it deserves—and have a great time doing it! With its included zoom lens, the new ultra-compact AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II, the D3300 is a small, easy to use HD-SLR. Capture beautiful 24.2-MP photos and 1080p Full HD videos with vibrant colors and softly blurred backgrounds, then share them instantly with your compatible smartphone and the optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter. Whether you're creating high-resolution panoramas, adding fun special effects or recording dazzling HD video with sound, the D3300 will bring you endless joy, excitement and memories—just like the special moments of your life.

CREATING BEAUTIFUL PHOTOS AND VIDEOS HAS NEVER BEEN MORE FUN.
Life is full of surprising, joyful moments—moments worth remembering. The D3300 makes it fun and easy to preserve those moments in the lifelike beauty they deserve: stunning 24.2-megapixel photos and 1080p Full HD videos with tack-sharp details, vibrant colors and softly blurred backgrounds. With its included zoom lens, the new ultra-compact AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II, the D3300 is a small and light HD-SLR and easy to use, too. Like sharing photos? The D3300 photos can appear instantly on your compatible smartphone or tablet for easy sharing with the optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter*! Whether you're creating high-resolution panoramas, adding artistic special effects or recording HD video with sound, the D3300 will bring you endless joy, excitement and memories—just like the special moments of your life.



BEAUTIFUL MEMORIES MADE EASY
CREATE STUNNING LIFELIKE PHOTOS AND HD VIDEOS
Taking snapshots with a smartphone is convenient, but are those photos good enough for preserving precious moments? The D3300's new EXPEED 4 lets you shoot at high speeds up to 5 frames per second, shoot in low light with high ISO sensitivity, create high-resolution panoramas and much more. Your 24.2-megapixel photos and 1080p Full HD videos will be so impressive, so rich with detail† and color—so lifelike—they'll bring back the feelings of the moments they capture.

USE YOUR SMARTPHONE WITH IT
SHARE PHOTOS INSTANTLY WITH YOUR COMPATIBLE SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
Attach the optional WU-1a Wireless Adapter and marvel as the photos you take with the D3300 instantly appear on your compatible smartphone or tablet. Share your favorite shots without missing a beat—text them, email them, upload them to your favorite social networking sites—it's your choice! You can even use your compatible smartphone or tablet as a remote monitor for the D3300. See what the camera sees and fire the shutter, perfect for self-portraits and group photos that actually include you.

IMPRESS WITH EVERY SHOT
SPECTACULAR PANORAMAS, GUIDE MODE AND FUN SPECIAL EFFECTS
Using the D3300 is super easy—and a blast. Can't get the whole scene into your frame? Turn on Easy Panorama Mode and pan across the scene—the D3300 will capture the entire view as a high-resolution panoramic image. It's that easy! Guide Mode gives step-by-step help when you need it (it's like having an expert at your side), and you can easily get creative with built-in Image Effects, filters and more. You even get to choose which color you want for your D3300—black, grey or red!.

TAKE IT EVERYWHERE
COMPACT, LIGHTWEIGHT AND RELIABLE
The D3300 is a small and light HD-SLR camera even when paired with the included AF-S DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR II lens, which has a new ultra-compact design. The combination is designed to fit comfortably in your hands, and all of the D3300's buttons and dials are positioned for convenient, efficient operation. You'll take the D3300 everywhere you go, which means you'll bring home all the beautiful memories of your activities.





CAPTURE THE SIGHTS AND SOUNDS
The D3300 doesn't only take great photos, it takes dazzling 1080p Full HD video with sound, too! Record smooth, ultra-sharp HD movies you can play back on your HDTV or upload to video sites. You can even apply those fun special effects for more creativity!







SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
 * AN-DC9 Strap
 * EN-EL14a Rechargeable Li-ion Battery
 * MH-24 Quick Charger
 * UC-E6 USB Cable
 * BF-1B Body Cap
 * DK-26 Eyepiece Cap
 * DK-17 Eyepiece
 * ViewNX 2



Download the user manual.
feature_bullets: 1080 (60, 50, 30, 25, 24 fps) hd video (mpeg 4/h.264/MOV).the d3300's 11 point autofocus system locks onto your subjects as soon as they enter the frame and stays with them until you catch the shot you want.
3 inch LCD with 921,000 dots; Lens Compatibility at a Glance; AF S Lens required for auto focus ; Optical Zoom 3x
